data.name: actionRequired
data.comment: progress embed heading when multiple matches for PoI edit

data.name: creations
data.comment: progress embed, heading of creations

data.name: currentBotState
data.comment: Bot state embed title

data.name: currentlyXServers
data.value: The bot is currently in {0} servers. Not yet processed data:
data.comment: Bot state embed description

data.name: dataByBot
data.comment: Bot state embed footer

data.name: downloadFailed
data.comment: cm / e attachment could not be downloaded

data.name: editMultiMatches
data.value: Please select the correct location. If you are not sure, let it time out. The following info is available:
data.comment: PoI edit has multiple matches in PokeNav database

data.name: edits
data.comment: progress embed, heading of edits section

data.name: embedFooter
data.value: use /pause or /resume commands to manage the import
data.comment: footer of the import progress embed

data.name: errorBadArgs
data.value: ⚠ Too many or few parameters. ⚠ Error message: ```{0}``` Please contact the bot owner by opening an issue at [GitHub](https://github.com/MaxEtMoritz/PNavCopy), providing what you did and which parameters you specified.
data.comment: Interaction failed because too many or too few parameters were given.

data.name: ErrorConvertFailed
data.value: ⚠ One or more parameters could not be converted. ⚠ Error message: ```{0}``` Please check your parameters. If they seem correct, open up an issue at [GitHub](https://github.com/MaxEtMoritz/PNavCopy), providing what you did, which parameters you entered and what the error message was.
data.comment: Interaction failed because Parameter(s) could not be converted.

data.name: errorException
data.value: ⚠ Internal Error. ⚠ The bot has encountered a problem while executing this interaction. If the error persists, please open an issue at [GitHub](https://github.com/MaxEtMoritz/PNavCopy), providing as much information as possible. This Error message will (hopefully😅) help the developer investigate: ```{0}```
data.comment: Interaction failed because of an Exception.

data.name: errorParseFailed
data.value: ⚠ Internal Error. ⚠ The bot has encountered a problem while executing this interaction. If the error persists, please open an issue at [GitHub](https://github.com/MaxEtMoritz/PNavCopy), providing as much information as possible. This Error message will (hopefully😅) help the developer investigate: ```{0}```
data.comment: Interaction failed because the Context was faulty

data.name: ErrorUnknownCommand
data.value: ⚠ Unknown interaction. ⚠ Please contact the bot owner by opening an issue at [GitHub](https://github.com/MaxEtMoritz/PNavCopy), providing what you were trying to do when getting this error.
data.comment: Interaction failed because it was not known.

data.name: goodbye
data.comment: /disconnect confirmed by Button click

data.name: guildId
data.comment: Bot state embed

data.name: importing
data.comment: progress embed heading while working

data.name: interactionUnsuccessful
data.comment: Interaction was not successful.

data.name: invalidCommandStructure
data.comment: Parse of text-based command failed

data.name: jsonParsingFailed
data.comment: cm / e attachment could not be parsed

data.name: locationIdParseFailed
data.value: Error: Parsing of PokeNav ID failed.
data.comment: PokeNav's location info embed could not be parsed correctly

data.name: modChannelFail
data.value: Did not receive a Response from PokeNav in time. Make sure PokeNav is able to respond in the Channel where you execute the command.
data.comment: /mod-channel failed, PokeNav did not respond

data.name: modChannelProblem
data.value: There was a problem with the mod-channel. Try to run `/mod-channel` and then `/resume` to try again.
data.comment: import, mod-channel was invalid

data.name: modChannelSuccess
data.comment: /mod-channel completed successfully

data.name: modChannelUnset
data.value: PokeNav Moderation Channel not set yet. Run `/mod-channel` to set it, then run `/resume` to create the PoI.
data.comment: import, no mod-channel was set yet.

data.name: noMsgHistoryPerm
data.value: Message History permission missing. Unable to handle location select dialog => edit skipped.
data.comment: The bot lacks "Read message history" permission in the mod-channel but needs it.

data.name: numCreations
data.comment: Bot state embed

data.name: numEdits
data.comment: Bot state embed

data.name: parameterMismatch
data.value: Too few or too many parameters. Expected {0} to {1}.
data.comment: text-based commands: too many or few parameters

data.name: parameterMultiMatches
data.value: There are multiple matches for one or more parameters. Please refine your query. ```{0}```
data.comment: text-based commands multiple matches for parameters

data.name: paramParseFailed
data.comment: text-based commands: Error while parsing parameters

data.name: paused
data.comment: progress embed heading while paused

data.name: pauseError
data.comment: /pause error

data.name: pauseInProgress
data.comment: /pause

data.name: pauseNoOp
data.value: ℹ Nothing to Pause here, no Bulk Import running at the moment.
data.comment: /pause when no import was running

data.name: pauseSuccessful
data.comment: /pause finished successfully

data.name: poiNotFound
data.comment: the PoI to edit was not found in the PokeNav database

data.name: pokeNavTimeout
data.value: PokeNav did not respond in time. Please try again manually.
data.comment: import, no response from PokeNav is received within 10 seconds

data.name: pokeNavUpdateTimeout
data.value: PokeNav did not update the select message in time, please try again manually.
data.comment: PokeNav did not update the "select location" message in time.

data.name: probablyFinished
data.comment: progress embed, time remaining description

data.name: promptMissingPerms
data.value: ⚠ Attention! ⚠ The Bot is missing permissions in the PokeNav mod-channel: {0} View Channel {1} Send Messages {2} Add Reactions (recommended but optional) {3} View message history (for ambiguous edits) Make sure to grant the neccessary permissions for the bot for <#{4}>.
data.comment: /mod-channel (Not all permissions granted for new mod-channel)

data.name: reactTimeout
data.value: No one reacted. Please try again manually.
data.comment: PoI edit had multiple matches but no one chose the right one.

data.name: resume
data.comment: /resume

data.name: resumeAlreadyRunning
data.value: ℹ Bulk import is already running, no need to resume.
data.comment: /resume when import is already in progress

data.name: resumeForPrediction
data.comment: progress embed, time remaining when paused

data.name: resumeNoOp
data.value: ℹ No data to import present.
data.comment: /resume when nothing can be resumed

data.name: selectRightLocation
data.value: Head to <#{0}> and select the right location!
data.comment: progress embed text when multiple matches for PoI edit

data.name: stillToDo
data.comment: progress embed text

data.name: sure
data.value: Are you really sure? The bot will need manual restart if you do this!
data.comment: /disconnect

data.name: testInstance

data.comment: text-based command failed
